title: Cremlino, grazie Papa, da scegliere sede nuovi negoziati
cleaned_sentences: ROME, May 20 - The Kremlin is aware of the Vatican offer to host the negotiations between Russia and Ukraine, but no decision has yet been taken.
The journalists of the Russian president Dmitrij Peskov reported it to journalists.
"Everyone is aware of this initiative of the Pope - he said in a statement relaunched by Tass -.
There was also a Vatican declaration.
And of course, the Russian part is grateful to all those who are willing to make their contribution.
But specific decisions have not yet been made on the place to continue the possible future negotiations" ..
